    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Creates EarthquakeActivity. Bundle is used to get the intent from EarthquakeAdapter view which contains the earthquake values needed to set the TextView values. A toolbar is also set to enable a user to return back to the previous MainActivity. Using the values from the intent, a MapView using GoogleMaps API is created using the coordinates of the earthquake selected.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class MainActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Loads activity state

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
        Method to save the state of EarthquakeActivity. The mapViewBundle is saved so that a new MapView does not need to be created and can be reused, using only the new coorindates of a selected earthquake.
        Overrides:
        onSaveInstanceState in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        outState - Bundle

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Inherited methods of OnMapReadyCallback for when MapView is resumed
        Overrides:
        onResume in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onLowMemory

        public void onLowMemory()
        Inherited methods of OnMapReadyCallback for when MapView is on low memory
        Specified by:
        onLowMemory in interface android.content.ComponentCallbacks
        Overrides:
        onLowMemory in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onMapReady

        public void onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        Method used to set MapView on a certain geographical position based of coordinates from earthquake. Map is also set with custom map style to remove unnecessary map details.
        Specified by:
        onMapReady in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
        Parameters:
        googleMap - GoogleMap object

      • setColor

        private void setColor(double magnitude)
        Method used to style the magnitude TextView. If a certain magnitude is given, the drawable chosen will reflect the severity of the earthquake, grey being severe and red being most severe.
        Parameters:
        magnitude - Magnitude used to dertermine which drawable style to use
